excerpt.rendered:
VDP03-B3 Kit is the ideal and economic video door phone solution kit which includes slim design 7 inch TFT display
monitor, outdoor full metal call station with IP54 rating as well as the accessories &brackets. Moreover, the handy
installation and crystal clear intercom bring you the excellent experience beyond imagination.
Features & Functions
· 7 inch TFT Color Monitor
· Touch Button Embedded on Panel

· 2-way audio communication over analog network
· Support up to 4 tenant stations / 2 entrance stations
